snippet: It’s not every firm where a top executive is accused of lying on a video for every employee to see. But that’s how Ray Dalio runs Bridgewater Associates, according to former employees....

headline.main: Repeal of Health Law Faces a New Hurdle: Older Americans
headline.print_headline: Repeal of Health Law Hits a New Snag: Older Adults

lead_paragraph: It’s not every firm where a top executive is accused of lying on a video for every employee to see. But that’s how Ray Dalio runs Bridgewater Associates, according to former employees.
